name: Red Dragon Wings
description: Are you the last Dragon? Only one way to find out. Penguin Games is proud to present our latest 2D game, with a simple interface and intuitive game play. Be the dragon as you navigate your way through various hurdles, seeing what top score and level you can reach.  This game is fully intergrated with the Game Center - so feel free to set your name on the leaderboards or grab as many achievements as you can.  If your feeling competitive challenge one of your friends via the main menu to see who is the last dragon.
